body: Hasn't anyone noticed? Lately we are losing old staff members, old regular players? Its terrible to watch this happen. But also have you noticed the new staff members and new players? Now that I look at it. The Avicus community and Staff team are going through a cycle. The old ones leave the new one's come in. So Avicus is just going through what anything would go through. So don't lose hope in Avicus. Its just a cycle and there's no way to stop it.
body_tagged: Hasn't anyone noticed? Lately we are losing old staff members, old regular players? Its terrible to watch this happen. But also have you noticed the new staff members and new players? Now that I look at it. The Avicus community and Staff team are going through a cycle. The old ones leave the new one's come in. So Avicus is just going through what anything would go through. So don't lose hope in Avicus. Its just a cycle and there's no way to stop it.
title: The Avicus cycle.

replies.body:
Yes, i have actually noticed this and its really sad :(
Some of our oldest players who go WAY back to the old days of mczone and have all the history and updates with them are just gone.
Its real sad.
Anyway, yes i agree with what you're saying
